DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : - Evaluation correlation sonographic parameter clinical finding ( e.g . digital examination ) cephalic ( occipital anterior ) position - Examination relationship various sonographic parameter - Determination intraobserver interobserver variation obtain sonographic measurement - Analysis temporal variation different sonographic measurement normal spontaneous vaginal delivery versus obstruct labor fetus occiput anterior versus persistent occiput posterior - Establishment sonopartogram replace objective way Friedmann - Establishment cut-off value may help clinician choose vaginal operative delivery caesarean section - Another interesting aspect intrapartum transperineal ultrasound image whether psychological benefit patient able follow ultrasound screen fetal head descent position assess objectively .
DOC.brief_title: Sonopartogram . The Next Step Delivery Room
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : - Evaluation correlation sonographic parameter clinical finding ( e.g . digital examination ) cephalic ( occipital anterior ) - Examination relationship various sonographic parameter - Determination intraobserver interobserver variation obtain sonographic measurement - Analysis temporal variation different sonographic measurement normal spontaneous vaginal delivery versus obstruct labor fetus occiput anterior versus persistent occiput posterior - Establishment sonopartogram replace objective way Friedmann - Determination cut-off value may help clinician choose vaginal operative delivery caesarean section - Investigation whether psychological benefit patient able follow ultrasound screen fetal head descent position assess objectively . Methods : Unselected population Personal characteristic : GA , BMI , age , gesta , para Gestational age 37 complete week date first- and/or mid-trimester scan . Each patient provide inform consent ultrasound measurement . Transperineal ultrasound image digital examination labor patient singleton fetus cephalic/pelvic presentation . Patients examine labor room . Admission time : - active labor demonstrate regular uterine contraction change cervical dilatation 2 cm , - subgroup : prolonged second stage labor ( full cervical dilatation > 3 h regional anesthesia administer 2 h absence regional anesthesia nulliparous woman , > 2 h regional anesthesia 1 h without anesthesia parous woman ) . Empty bladder . Ultrasound machine 3.5-5MHz transducer use TA TPU measurement . The probe enclose latex glove cover ultrasound gel place labia pubic symphysis/perineal . Measured parameter : Clinical examination ( digital vaginal + Leopold ) follow immediately acquisition sonographic plane necessary evaluate : occiput position , long axis pubic symphysis , infrapubic line , progression angle , distance progession , direction progression , midline angle , head perineum distance . Identification measurement caput succedaneum ( vertical+orizontal ) molding ( vertical ) present . All parameter record electronically later analysis + volume , possible . TPU scan perform different time labor , - Hourly complete dilation ( 1st phase ) - At 10 minute complete dilation ( 2nd phase ) ( least one contraction examination ) . Notation time delivery later use calculate interval scan delivery . In case measurement perform concert digital examination ( immediately ) . Intraobserver interobserver analysis 100 woman assess TPU examination study , least one set two replicate scan obtain approximately time . These woman provide set scan various time throughout labor , use ass intraobserver variability . In order ass interobserver variability , second/independent well trained observer , blind 's result , - obtain duplicate set scan distinct time labor among randomly select woman ( one woman repeat three time point ) . The consecutive scan perform 3 min assessment two observer - measure parameter store 3D volume first observer The goal generate pair set replicate image nearly identical condition . The measurement ultrasound scan obtain offline , acquisition describe plane , image store US machine hard disk . Thus , manage obstetrician blind transperineal ultrasound finding . Head position obtain ultrasound image communicated case clinical misdiagnose ethical reason . The decision whether expectant management , vaginal extraction Cesarean section appropriate make exclusively basis clinical examination . Demographic data collect include length second stage labor , mode delivery , maternal neonatal outcome .
DOC.criteria: active labor singleton pregnancy eutrophic fetus cephalic presentation indication elective caesarean section noncephalic presentation prior caesarean delivery fetal hypotrophy macrosomy multiple pregnancy
